Name: Zomcade
About the game: In 2063, Space Team X had finally arrived home in City A from their expedition to Planet 1B34. With their ship also arrived what would be known today as the Dark Plague. The Dark Plague is a highly contagious virus. A single touch could mean death for anyone who comes in contact with an infected human. These infected humans have been named...'THE ILL'. Zomcade brings you to the arcade were you will be able to try and survive a multitude of scenarios. These game modes are set up to scare and challenge the player in some way. Are you ready to face your fears and beat the Zomcade challenge! For any questions info or bug reports about the game please feel free to join the Zomcade discord! Just click on the 'Visit the website' Link on the store page.
